name: composables
description: Vue composables providing reusable reactive logic

useCubeEditor.ts.description: Composable for centralized cube editing state and operations

useDeviceType.ts.description: Composable for detecting device type (mobile, tablet, desktop)

useLODStatistics.ts.description: Composable for collecting LOD (Level of Detail) performance metrics

useTouchGestures.ts.description: Composable for touch gesture handling on mobile devices

useWindowManager.ts.description: Composable for window management (dock, float, minimize, maximize)

useMetamodeDatabase.ts.description: Composable for accessing compiled MetaMode database at runtime
